data.title: Soccer live scores, results, standings, statistics
data.meta_description: Soccer live - soccer scores, standings, fixtures, statistics and results archive. Livesport.com offers scores service for more than 1000 soccer competitions from around the world.
data.text: Soccer live on Livesport.com - soccer scores, results, livescore, standings and statistics. Livesport.com offers scores service from more than 1000 soccer competitions from around the world. We provide Live Centre (detailed match statistics live) from MLS, Copa America, Champions League, EPL and all major European leagues. You'll find here not only live scores, half-time and final results, lineups, goal scorers, yellow and red cards, but also ball possession, shots on/off goal, free kicks, corner kicks, offsides and fouls. In addition, Livesport.com provides live commentary from the Champions League, Europa League, EPL, LaLiga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Ligue 1 and Eredivisie.
